entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
